title: How it feels to be ulted by Sona

replies.body: I always imagine the stunned champion(s) as the star(s) of Riverdance.
I'm assuming by your username you are a Taric main. ;)
Or a MLP fan.
why not both? {{champion:120}}
{{champion:120}} "Suffering is magic"
your going places sir
*you're
I don't deserve credits for this, it's actually one of his quotes. ^^
http://static.fjcdn.com/pictures/First+i+was+likebut+then+i+saw+heresy_154dda_4955803.jpg
This guy, right here.

>
> I'm assuming by your username you are a Taric main. ;)

I do love his pizzazz, but I'm closer to a Lux on the sparkle meter. ;)

So basically, when your entire team gets hit it is like:
https://rt2presents.files.wordpress.com/2015/03/riverdance-o.gif
The only way to make it more appropriate would be if you have Leprechaun Veigar on your team.
Riot seems to be responding a ton more to posts... wp...
The {{champion:37}} {{champion:236}}  to your problem is to buy {{item:3140}} . No problem

Don't judge me

"Sona+Lucían"=Solution.
PS I hate you for the pun +1
Upvoted for your name. I also un-upvoted, just so I could upvote again for the pun.
LilyPichu is that you?
That's like my favorite episode
Upvoted for your icon.
upvoted for upvoting a tsm icon (maybe next year tsm can do better than clg,~~summer split finals never forget~~ maybe next year)
Next year is our year. TSM! TSM! TSM!
*Cough*FNC*Cough* Oh sorry just got something in my throat don't mind me ;3
Don't worry, FNC will need to face SKT eventually, and then Fnatic can join TSM as they watch Faker prove his divinity once again.
Let's be honest, like anyone has a chance of stopping SKT. Still, FNC got further than TSM  Har har har (it's all banter ;3)
Faker has grown weary with the blasphemous claims that he is no longer the best, and has felt the need to demonstrate his powers to the world once more.
As if we needed reminding xD
There exist fools that believe that other players are as good as he is, such as PawN or Bjergsen. But they do no understand. Other people are only able to play because Faker allows them to do so.
So when's the wedding?
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/497/564/d02.gif
I get that Faker is a good player but you're licking him up like he's your wife.
http://i43.photobucket.com/albums/e364/mdobilas/Cant-tell-if-troll-or-just-stupid.jpg
Who talks about their wife like that?

Haha, Fnatic has Febiven, the Faker Slayer. Their botlane is very experienced and Yellowstar is one of the best shotcallers to have ever played at worlds.

If FNC loses, it won't be because of Faker but more probably MaRin or Bengi.
[Here is why FNC doesn't stand a chance ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oHg5SJYRHA0)
Oh, come on, you're better than that...
Evidently not.
That's just how they roll, I guess.
So you dont have a gif, but a vid. Nice,
Hopefully Rush and Impact and maybe maybe a korean support. Wolf would be nice. Anything is good, aslong as they aren't new to the lcs completely like Santorin.

No, next year is TB. Turtle and Bjergsen.

I mean, as long as TSM doesn't put Regi back on the actual team, they'll be fine.
It feels like a normal stun to me. I never noticed the dance animation when she ulted until 1 week ago when I was reading the ability..
XD
Gosh I haven't watched Family Guy in a while.
